reviewText: This is truly a must see series. Like many I was shocked to see it cancelled after one season. A true testimony to the networks short sightedness. Was thrilled to see it on Amazon. I bought three sets. One as a gift and two for ME!  Lots of laughs, puns and outstanding writing. What a combination!
Favorite birthday gift for a long-time fan.
Had Friends who had never watched the Series...they were falling out of their chairs from laughing sooo hard!

I loved this series and was heartbroken when it was canceled after the first season. Although it's very different from Eureka, I loved it for the same reasons. It had it all...drama, suspense, humor, comedy, romance & science fiction.
My son remembered this show from when he was younger.  I was thrilled to find this and give it to him for Christmas.  Came brand new and in perfect condition
We enjoy watching an episode every night!
Fun!  Loved watching this with my 10 and 13 year old sons.

watched this series every Saturday morning when possible, if you missed a Saturday you were just out of luck. I missed a few being a truck driver, so when I saw this I just had to have it. being used some discs have scratches but 1/2 way through i'am well satisified.
